A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It looks like Disney can't buy reviews quick enough to cope with the kicking it's getting from the fans. This was very disappointing. It killed the trilogy for me as I no longer care what happens in episode 9. This is a classic example of bad story telling. The poorly written script destroyed the credibility of each and every character. 

Here are my main problems with the film in no particular order:

Terrible slapstick comedy at the beginning.
A spaceship that takes an age to position itself over the enemy craft in order to release it bombs.
The whole sub story of Fin and Rose.
Riding those stupid animals to escape from the pointless casino city. It was like watching episodes 1\, 2 and 3 again.
Why didn't admiral holdo (Laura dern with purple hair) just tell Po the plan? He wouldn't have tried a mutiny to take over the ship... which went nowhere anyway.
Luke was going to kill his nephew for sensing a little bit of dark in him? Not a chance.
Princess leia flying like superman in space. oh my god\, who thought that was a good idea\, seriously.
Rey having about 5 minutes of training and suddenly understands all about the force.
Rey having zero light sabre training but can defeat all the imperial guards.
Why didn't they destroy the rebel hideout on Crait from space with their huge guns?
Luke would never even consider murdering his nephew in his sleep.
There's no other way out of this Crete fortress........ oh wait yes there is.
Luke's death sucked.
BB8 operating the imperial walker tank thing.
Snokes ship gets torn in half by another ship going thru it at light speed and the only survivors are Finn And Rose and a single ship they need to escape.
snoke gets killed like a complete amateur as he's explaining how he knows everything about everything.
Too much CGI
Bad CGI in some places
The total incompetence of the first order in every scene. 
we know absolutely no more about any of the characters.
Are Rey's parents important..... nope just drunk losers that sold her.
Kylo Ren doesn't receive any further training that was promised in TFA\, but is now able to kill snoke and become supreme leader.

The list could go on\, but it's pointless. They messed up big time with this film.
